EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_EMC World_2015.Promo Email w/ header
EmailTemplate.subject: See you in Las Vegas for EMC World!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EVENT NAME Tagline Pivotal is a sponsor, presenter and exhibitor at EMC's biggest industry event <http://pivotal.io/emc-world> – May 4-7th in Las Vegas, NV. If you're planning to attend EMC World, stop by booth #349 to learn more about Pivotal’s leading agile development services <https://pivotal.io/labs>, open cloud platform <https://pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/pivotal-cloud-foundry> and open suite of big data products.
We will be hosting a number of sessions at the event, which can be found in the Session Guide <http://pivotal.io/emc-world>. Additionally, Pivotal CEO, Paul Maritz will join Joe Tucci and Pat Gelsinger to present a keynote session about Enterprise Hybrid Cloud and PaaS on Tuesday, May 5th.
Pivotal’s presence at the EMC World will showcase our full value proposition. By unifying big data, cloud and agile product development, Pivotal provides the tangible answer to digital transformation challenges.
Keep an eye on @PivotalBigData <https://twitter.com/pivotalbigdata> for live Twitter updates.
We look forward to seeing you there! The Pivotal Team
